## maximum matching
* graphclasses.org: [maximum matching](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_13.html)
* [â†—](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_13.html) A matching in a graph is a subset of pairwise disjoint edges (any two edges that do not share an endpoint). The parameter maximum matching of a graph $G$ is the largest size of a matching in $G$.
* is equivalent to [vertex cover](#4lp9Yj) (see more info there)
